Ahmed's Portfolio

My Website Challenge

Back when I first started developing websites I studied web layouts and designs with a developer's eye and eventually started noticing recurring concepts, themes, layouts, structures and components. Realising that many website designs could be loosely grouped into at least six categories being the portfolio layout, the blog, the card magazine, the e-commerce grid, the flat card and the app-style dashboard layout. So I searched online for four .psd design layouts of varying levels of complexity for each category, with the intention of developing them into websites using bootstrap 3 with IE9+ compatibility.
